p: Response plots (see S5 File) indicate that KFD outbreaks are more likely to occur when the proportional area of moist evergreen forest is intermediate or high (>20% of the area), the proportion of dry deciduous forest is low (<10% of the area), the amount of forest loss is higher (> 10% of the area), elevation exceeds 650â€“675 m.a.s.l., forest diversity is higher (>1.0) and proportional area of plantation is higher.
